simplesect.title: Detailed Description
simplesect.para: Global path planner implementing the RRT algorithm.

This plugin was created to interface with the nav_core/base_global_planner framework and replace the default global planner used in the navigation stack. This plugin uses an RRT algorithm which generates a path by creating a tree full of random nodes that are connected to their nearest node neighbor if the path is clear. Once the goal is reached by the tree, the planner returns a path which is a connection of the nodes in the tree that traverse from start to goal.
